WorkItem.Description:
As per the title, adding a button margin style in the Resources section of a Window/UserControl with the WPF Toolkit DataGrid causes Visual Studio to consume 100% CPU. I am using Visual Studio 2008 and WPF Toolkit June 2009. I have replicated the problem on two computers.
 
To replicate, use the following XAML:
 
<Window x:Class="WpfApplication.Window1"
    xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/presentation"
    xmlns:x="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml"
    xmlns:toolkit="http://schemas.microsoft.com/wpf/2008/toolkit"
    Title="Window1" Height="300" Width="300">
    <Window.Resources>
        <Style TargetType="{x:Type Button}">
            <Setter Property="Margin" Value="3" />
        </Style>
    </Window.Resources>
    <toolkit:DataGrid>
        <toolkit:DataGrid.Columns>
            <toolkit:DataGridTextColumn />
        </toolkit:DataGrid.Columns>
    </toolkit:DataGrid>
</Window>
WorkItem.Summary: Button Margin style with DataGrid hangs Visual Studio designer

Comments.Message: We already have a bug on this in our internal database. Thanks for reporting this.
